formulas.name: formulaAuthority
formulas.expression: "Entscheidungsträger - " + IF(ISNULL({!Get_Opportunity.Decision_maker_name__c}), NULL, {!Get_Opportunity.Decision_maker_name__r.Name}) + BR() + "Genehmigungsprozess Rekrutierungslösung - " + IF(ISNULL({!Get_Opportunity.Approval_process_recruitment_solution__c}), NULL, {!Get_Opportunity.Approval_process_recruitment_solution__c}) + BR() + "Hauptfaktoren Entscheidungsfindung - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Key_factors_in_decision_making__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Key_factors_in_decision_making__c}))

formulas.name: formulaChallenge
formulas.expression: "Vernachlässigte Funnelbereiche - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Funnel_areas_of_neglect__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Funnel_areas_of_neglect__c})) + BR() + "Herausfordernde Rollen und Abteilungen - " + IF(ISNULL({!Get_Opportunity.Challenging_roles_departments__c}), NULL, {!Get_Opportunity.Challenging_roles_departments__c}) + BR()

formulas.name: formulaCompetitors
formulas.expression: "Competitor 1: current & future - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Competitor_1_current_future__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Competitor_1_current_future__c})) + BR() + "Competitor 2: current & future - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Competitor_2_current_future__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Competitor_2_current_future__c})) + BR() + "Competitor 3: current & future - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Competitor_3_current_future__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Competitor_3_current_future__c})) + BR() + "Other Competitor - " + IF(ISNULL({!Get_Opportunity.Other_Competitor__c}), NULL, {!Get_Opportunity.Other_Competitor__c})

formulas.name: formulaExploration
formulas.expression: "Erfolgsmessung - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Success_measurement__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Success_measurement__c})) + BR() + "Jährliches Einstellungsvolumen - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Annual_recruitment_volume__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Annual_recruitment_volume__c})) + BR() + "Existenz Employer Branding - " + IF({!Get_Opportunity.Existence_employer_branding__c}, "True", "False")

formulas.name: formulaMoney
formulas.expression: "Jährliches Recrutierungsbudget - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Total_annual_recruiting_budget__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Total_annual_recruiting_budget__c})) + BR() + "Verfügbares Budget in Quartal/Jahr - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Budget_availability_next_quarter_year__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Budget_availability_next_quarter_year__c})) + BR()

formulas.name: formulaPrioritization
formulas.expression: "Implemntierungszeitplan - " + IF(ISNULL(TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Implementation_timeline__c})), NULL, TEXT({!Get_Opportunity.Implementation_timeline__c})) + BR() + "Priorisierung beeinflussende Ereignisse - " + IF(ISNULL({!Get_Opportunity.Events_impacting_prioritization__c}), NULL, {!Get_Opportunity.Events_impacting_prioritization__c}) + BR()

Flow.interviewLabel: Populate SQL Identifier fields on event {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Populate SQL Identifier fields on event
